underlying_goal: To add a fact-checking step to an existing brainstorming pipeline to prevent hallucinations or incorrect claims from being treated as fact.
primary_success: Successfully identified the lack of fact-checking as a gap, designed a new 'FACT_CHECK_PROMPT', and correctly integrated it into the existing multi-phase Python pipeline, updating all relevant functions and prompts.
brief_summary: The user asked if the brainstorming pipeline flags incorrect facts. The agent identified this as a gap, then implemented a new fact-checking phase. This involved creating a new prompt, updating several Python functions to run critique and fact-checking in parallel, and modifying the final synthesis step to incorporate the new fact-checking outputs.
